verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H384><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> to the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>

and say <S%H559><s%> to them, 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Cursed <S%H779><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> does not heed <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H384><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>

which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> your forefathers in the day <S%H1><s%> that I brought <S%H3117><s%> them out of the land <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> from the iron <S%H4714><s%> furnace, <S%H1270><s%> saying, <S%H3564><s%> 'Listen <S%H559><s%> to My voice, <S%H8085><s%> and do <S%H6963><s%> according to all <S%H6213><s%> which <S%H3605><s%> I command <S%H834><s%> you; so you shall be My people, <S%H6680><s%> and I will be your God, <S%H5971><s%>'

in order <S%H4616><s%> to confirm <S%H6965><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to your forefathers, to give <S%H1><s%> them a land <S%H5414><s%> flowing <S%H776><s%> with milk <S%H2100><s%> and honey, <S%H2461><s%> as [it is] this <S%H1706><s%> day. <S%H2088><s%> "'"Then I answered <S%H3117><s%> and said, <S%H6030><s%> "Amen, <S%H559><s%> O Lord. <S%H543><s%>"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and in the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H384><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them.

'For I solemnly <S%H5749><s%> warned <S%H5749><s%> your fathers in the day <S%H1><s%> that I brought <S%H3117><s%> them up from the land <S%H5927><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> even to this <S%H4714><s%> day, <S%H2088><s%> warning <S%H3117><s%> persistently, <S%H5749><s%> saying, <S%H7925><s%> "Listen <S%H559><s%> to My voice. <S%H8085><s%>"

'Yet they did not obey <S%H8085><s%> or incline <S%H5186><s%> their ear, <S%H241><s%> but walked, <S%H1980><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one, <S%H376><s%> in the stubbornness <S%H8307><s%> of his evil <S%H7451><s%> heart; <S%H3820><s%> therefore I brought <S%H935><s%> on them all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H384><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> [them] to do, <S%H6213><s%> but they did <S%H6213><s%> not.' "

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, "A conspiracy <S%H7195><s%> has been found <S%H4672><s%> among the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and among the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"They have turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their ancestors <S%H7223><s%> who <S%H834><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> My words, <S%H1697><s%> and they have gone <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them; the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> have broken <S%H6565><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I made <S%H3772><s%> with their fathers."

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold <S%H2009><s%> I am bringing <S%H935><s%> disaster <S%H9567><s%> on them which <S%H834><s%> they will not be able <S%H3201><s%> to escape; <S%H3318><s%> though they will cry <S%H2199><s%> to Me, yet I will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them.

"Then the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> to the gods <S%H430><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> they burn <S%H6999><s%> incense, <S%H6999><s%> but they surely <S%H3467><s%> will not save <S%H3467><s%> them in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their disaster. <S%H9567><s%>

"For your gods <S%H430><s%> are as many <S%H4557><s%> as your cities, <S%H5892><s%> O Judah; <S%H3063><s%> and as many <S%H4557><s%> as the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> are the altars <S%H4196><s%> you have set <S%H7760><s%> up to the shameful <S%H1322><s%> thing, <S%H1322><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> to burn <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> to Baal. <S%H1168><s%>

"Therefore do not pray <S%H6419><s%> for this <S%H384><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> lift <S%H5375><s%> up a cry <S%H7440><s%> or prayer <S%H8605><s%> for them; for I will not listen <S%H8085><s%> when <S%H6256><s%> they call <S%H7121><s%> to Me because <S%H1157><s%> of their disaster. <S%H9567><s%>

"What <S%H4100><s%> right has My beloved <S%H3039><s%> in My house <S%H1004><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> she has done <S%H6213><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> vile <S%H4209><s%> deeds <S%H4209><s%>? Can the sacrificial <S%H6944><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> take <S%H5674><s%> away <S%H5674><s%> from you your disaster, <S%H9567><s%> So <S%H227><s%> [that] you can rejoice <S%H5937><s%>?"

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> your name, <S%H8034><s%> "A green <S%H7488><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> tree, <S%H2132><s%> beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in fruit <S%H6529><s%> and form <S%H8389><s%>"; With the noise <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> tumult <S%H1999><s%> He has kindled <S%H3341><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> on it, And its branches <S%H1808><s%> are worthless. <S%H9570><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> who planted <S%H5193><s%> you, has pronounced <S%H1696><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you because <S%H1558><s%> of the evil <S%H9567><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have done <S%H6213><s%> to provoke <S%H3707><s%> Me by offering <S%H6999><s%> up sacrifices <S%H6999><s%> to Baal. <S%H1168><s%>
Moreover, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3045><s%> it known <S%H3045><s%> to me and I knew <S%H3045><s%> it; Then <S%H227><s%> Thou didst show <S%H7200><s%> me their deeds. <S%H4611><s%>

But I was like a gentle <S%H9017><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> led <S%H2986><s%> to the slaughter; <S%H2873><s%> And I did not know <S%H3045><s%> that they had devised <S%H2803><s%> plots <S%H4284><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, [saying,] "Let us destroy <S%H7843><s%> the tree <S%H6086><s%> with its fruit, <S%H3899><s%> And let us cut <S%H3772><s%> him off <S%H3772><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the living, <S%H2416><s%> That his name <S%H8034><s%> be remembered <S%H2142><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>"

But, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> who judges <S%H8199><s%> righteously, <S%H6664><s%> Who tries <S%H974><s%> the feelings <S%H3629><s%> and the heart, <S%H3820><s%> Let me see <S%H7200><s%> Thy vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on them, For to Thee have I committed <S%H1540><s%> my cause. <S%H7379><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> your life, <S%H5315><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Do not prophesy <S%H5012><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that you might not die <S%H4191><s%> at our hand <S%H3027><s%>";

therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am about to punish <S%H6485><s%> them! The young <S%H970><s%> men <S%H970><s%> will die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%> will die <S%H4191><s%> by famine; <S%H7458><s%>

and a remnant <S%H7611><s%> will not be left <S%H1961><s%> to them, for I will bring <S%H935><s%> disaster <S%H9567><s%> on the men <S%H376><s%> of Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> â€“ the year <S%H8141><s%> of their punishment. <S%H6486><s%> "
